page.title: 10TRADE
page.content: {HEXHAM MARKET. The market is very busy and there is lots of shouting.There are lots of things to sell like fruit,sweets,toys etc.If you get there about 10 minutes before it closes every thing is cheap.The covered in bit is called the shambles which was built in 1766.The market starts at 9.00 am and closes inbeween half past 4 or 5.I think the market would be nice if it was bigger but there is nowhere to put it.The car park is closed on Tuesday because of the market being there.At Easter a girl and a man dressed up as bears come and have a lucky dip. The market has birthday cards as well.The market is near the abbey.In the summer,beside the market,there is a puppet show called Punch and Judy.As well as that there is a magic show and people take part in it.
